plot: When an HIV positive man phones the local help line, he gets less than he bargained for. After being put on hold, being transferred and being Dis'd, he loses more than a few T-Cells.
title: Lost Cause
plot_es: When an HIV positive man phones the local help line, he gets less than he bargained for. After being put on hold, being transferred and being Dis'd, he loses more than a few T-Cells.
plot_en: When an HIV positive man phones the local help line, he gets less than he bargained for. After being put on hold, being transferred and being Dis'd, he loses more than a few T-Cells.
